text.text:
### Introduction

Version **0.5-RC** of *History Tracers* introduces readers, listeners, and users to the project's standards, along with a variety of new features designed to enhance the learning process.

Highlights of this version include

- The addition of a section dedicated to text comprehension ([understand texts](https://historytracers.org/index.html?page=literature) ).
- The transformation of the web server into a development and content creation tool â€” a feature still in progress.
- The integration of educational audiovisual elements in the ["Genealogical Tree"](https://historytracers.org/index.html?page=families) section.
- The ability to export families in CSV and GEDCOM formats, bridging the gap between theory and practice.
- Integration with [Piper](https://github.com/rhasspy/piper/), enabling text-to-audio conversion.
- New content in the sections: [First Steps](https://historytracers.org/index.html?page=first_steps), [General History](https://historytracers.org/index.html?page=history) and [Genealogica Tree](https://historytracers.org/index.html?page=families).
